attributes.action: encourage a windfarm on Portsdown Hill with blades from Newport IOW
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Portsdown Hill is a windy ridge already despoiled by unsightly quarrying, radar stations, MoD buildings and national grid pylons. A windfarm here would be effective and could resurrect the doomed IOW turbine blade industry in its hour of need.
